trans-unit.source: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.
trans-unit.target: 表示与文本输入包括撰写文本本身、 任何的相关的控件或系统文本相关的撰写并的组合的完成状态。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, and composition text as initial values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>，源元素和撰写文本作为初始值的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used to create a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>, the new instance will have <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> set to **On**.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此构造函数创建的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>，新的实例将具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A>设置为**上**。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>

trans-unit.source: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 要与此文本组合关联输入管理器。

trans-unit.source: A source element for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 此文本组合一个源元素。

trans-unit.source: The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基础源元素的对象必须实现<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the initial text for the composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含撰写的初始文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will become the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*> property in the new class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将成为的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>在新的类实例的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"></xref>, source element, composition text, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> setting as initial values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>类，将指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputManager"> </xref>，源元素、 组合文本和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref>将设置为初始值的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 要与此文本组合关联输入管理器。

trans-unit.source: A source element for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 此文本组合一个源元素。

trans-unit.source: The object underlying the source element must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 基础源元素的对象必须实现<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the initial text for the composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含撰写的初始文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter will become the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*> property in the new class instance.
trans-unit.target: 此参数将成为的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>在新的类实例的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying desired auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref>指定此文本组合的所需的自动完成行为的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets the auto-complete setting for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取此文本组合的自动完成设置。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref> enumerations specifying the current auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete"></xref>指定此文本组合的当前的自动完成行为的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Completes this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 完成此文本组合。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the static <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A> method with this text composition as the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用静态<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A>与此文本撰写作为输入参数的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此文本组合的组合文本。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含此文本组合的组合文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets any control text associated with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此文本组合关联任何控件文本。

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含与此文本组合关联任何控件文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the system composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此文本组合的系统撰写文本。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the system composition text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含此文本组合的系统撰写文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the system text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此文本组合的系统文本。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the system text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含此文本组合系统文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此文本组合的当前文本。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the current text for this text composition.
trans-unit.target: 包含此文本组合的当前文本的字符串。
